email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for a laycan of October 15-20. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight quote is in the low 50s, specifically $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider a rate in the mid-40s, say $45.50 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $45.50 is a bit too low given current market conditions. However, I can offer a revised rate of $48.00 per metric ton. Laytime is set at 72 hours total, and demurrage is $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $48.00 is more reasonable, but we’d like to push for $47.00 per metric ton. Also, can we extend the laytime to 96 hours? The demurrage rate is acceptable. Let me know if we can finalize at these terms. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, after discussing with the owners, we can agree to $47.50 per metric ton and extend the laytime to 96 hours. Demurrage remains at $20,000 per day pro rata. If this works for you, I’ll prepare the charter party agreement. Let me know. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that sounds fair. Let’s proceed with $47.50 per metric ton, 96 hours laytime, and $20,000 demurrage. Please send over the charter party agreement for review. Thanks for your flexibility. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ll have the charter party agreement sent to you by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation, and I look forward to working with you on this shipment. Best regards, Sarah
